ksoderlu/IG_Dynamo_chi020_tanh_w0.60_c0.25/¶

Examples of visualized images.¶

Time evolution of kinetic energy density \(E_{kin} = \frac{1}{2} v^{2}\) in the spherical shell as function of time normalized by the magnetic diffusion time \(\tau_{\eta} = L^{2} / \eta\).

Time evolution of magnetic energy density \(E_{mag} = \frac{1}{2Pm E} B^{2}\) in the spherical shell as function of time normalized by the magnetic diffusion time \(\tau_{\eta} = L^{2} / \eta\).

Radial magnetic field \(B_r\) at the outer boundary \(r = r_o\).

\(z\)-component of the magnetic field \(B_z\) at the equatorial plane \(z = 0\).

Radial velocity \(u_r\) at the equatorial plane \(z = 0\).

Magnetic energy density spectra as a function of spherical harmonic degree \(l\).

Kinetic energy density spectra as a function of spherical harmonic degree \(l\).
